description.value: A garage must be mounted on a ship thatâ€™s Small or larger. It can store 1 Large or smaller terrestrial vehicle. While a vehicle is housed in a garage, repairs on it take half the time. A vehicle can be deployed from the garage directly to the surface if the ship has landed, or it can be loaded into an available @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.vehicles.Actor.x0klv9uWW4crarM5]{drop pod} (Starfinder Starship Operations Manual 25) or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.starship-components.Item.ZCdtfwxHAsEthpzy]{sky crane} (page 29).
